title: 11/27: Waiver Wire and Playoff Help (Fantasy Football Podcast)
description:
First of all, get Austin Ekeler. But if he's not available, who are our top priorities this week (1:30)? We really like the DEN and KC DSTs, and we're not sure if the replacement RBs for IND and JAC will thrive this week, but keep an eye on Doug Martin, Josh Reynolds and Adam Humphries ... Plenty of news and notes (8:40) including Eric Ebron's outlook, then a sneak peak at the Waiver Wire for each position (18:54) and we look ahead (30:36) to Weeks 14 and 15 with some DST help. Then we give our thoughts on GB-MIN (33:22) and TEN-HOU (38:30) with some QBs who are tough to rank ... Waiver Wire QBs (42:40) including Lamar Jackson and Marcus Mariota, RBs (45:00) including LeGarrette Blount and Theo Riddick, WRs (50:03) including Christian Kirk and Chris Conley, TEs (53:25) including the LAR TEs and Chris Herndon, plus DSTs and IDP (57:20) ... Your emails at fantasyfootball@cbsi.com
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
itunes:author: CBS Sports, Fantasy Football, Rookies, Rankings, Waiver Wire
itunes:subtitle: Austin Ekeler would be great, but if you can't add him don't worry, there are plenty of great players on waivers this week.
